issues.message: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

issues.context: <http://www.gedit.org/>
issues.message: This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 3:1.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 3:1.

issues.context: <button id="archiv" class="archiv" style="position: fixed; top: 1rem; left: 1rem; background: orange; color: black; border: 2px solid black; border-radius: 1rem; padding: 1rem; font-size: 2rem;">Archiv</button>
issues.message: This element has "position: fixed". This may require scrolling in two dimensions, which is considered a failure of this Success Criterion.
Anchor element found with a name attribute but without a href or link text. Consider moving the name attribute to become an ID of a parent or nearby element.
Anchor elements should not be used for defining in-page link targets. If not using the ID for other purposes (such as CSS or scripting), consider moving it to a parent element.
